about_the_game:
After installation, you can find your Digital Deluxe content in the game's install directory.

The extras you receive as part of the Digital Deluxe Edition include:

  • Soundtrack

    The complete game soundtrack with over 90 tracks and a total running time of over 4 hours!

  • ''Finding Dragonland – The Making of 'Angels with Scaly Wings'“

    Get a sneak peek into the game's two-year development!

  • Artwork

    A selection of gorgeous artwork and backgrounds from the game, suitable for use as wallpapers.

  • Icons

    A number of exclusive icons and avatars to deck out your social media!

fullgame.name: Angels with Scaly Wings™ / 鱗羽の天使

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux x86/x86_64
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX Compatible Card
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX Compatible Card
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
